gameDetails.name: Die wandelnden TÃ¼rme: Der Zauberturm
gameDetails.description:
This expansion consists of 5 expansion modules, which can be combined arbitrarily.
The 5 modules are:

     Elixir Fountain - Lets you fill one of your empty magic flasks, if landed on
     Spiderweb - Move the same amount of steps that took you on the spiderweb again
     Hag - When the hag lands on a space occupied by a wizard, the wizard has to empty one of his filled magic flasks
     The Raven - If the raven moves to a space with wizards, each player that has a wizard on the space gets a raven feather (max. 3) which let you execute one of three actions (Play your third movement card, use 1 magic spell without using a magic flask, advance any  1 wizard 1-6 spaces)
     Magic Tower - If a wizard moves to the magic tower, it may use 1 magic spell without using a magic flask
